content: this cute little bag uses less than one 20 gram mini skein of sock yarn 16 grams including the twisted cord so it s the perfect way to show off your favorite hand-dye the stitch pattern is great for variegated yarns and it knits up fast with zero purling originally designed for tabletop rpg dice the bag holds up to 10 standard sets it s also the perfect size for tiny gifts tarot or playing cards or any other little treasures gauge is unimportant but may affect yarn requirements the pattern should be easy to adapt to heavier weights for a bigger bag
